item.title: We Don't Do Segues Here
item.description: In this inaugural episode of whiletrue.fm, we discuss the Elm programming language, Hidden Figures, mechanical keyboards, walking simulators, bad segues and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this inaugural episode of whiletrue.fm, we discuss the Elm programming language, Hidden Figures, mechanical keyboards, walking simulators, bad segues and more!
item.itunes:summary: In this inaugural episode of whiletrue.fm, we discuss the Elm programming language, Hidden Figures, mechanical keyboards, walking simulators, bad segues and more!
item.itunes:author: Kenneth Love, Mike Overby, Sam Rose, and Daniel Lemmond
item.content:encoded:
Elm

  • Elm programming language
  • Learn You a Haskell for Great Good! by Miran Lipovača
  • PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds (PUBG)

PyGotham 2017

  • PyGotham 2017
    • All talks
    • “Those Who Care. Teach!” by Kenneth Love
      • Video, from PyOhio 2017
  • Color Blind Awareness explains colorblindness
    • See also: types of colorblindness
  • 2012 Spotify community thread asking for monaural (Scroll down for comments)
    • First official response from Spotify, in 2013 (scapegoating hypothetical producer objections to monaural downmixing)
    • Second, final response from Spotify, in 2014 (“Not Right Now”)
    • Latest comments in 2017 on the 21st page (As recent as one day before the podcast recording in 2017)
    • Virtually every other comment in this chain is a different user (both the
      partially deaf and those with broken headphones) explaining why this feature
      is important to them. Check the thread tags:
      #SpotifyDontCareAboutHearingImpaired
  • HBO GO
  • Fandor

We Don’t Do That Here

  • “We Don’t Do That Here” by Aja Hammerly

Gender Disparities in Tech

  • TEDx UCCS
    • “Harnessing the Power of Curiosity” by Daniel Lemmond (not yet posted)
    • “Research - An Avenue for Curiosity” by Abby Graese, Dilly’s girlfriend (not yet posted)
  • Infographics from digitalundivided demonstrating pay gap between white men and black women, which Kenneth referred to
    • (Oh no, the ombudsman wrote “pay gap”? The flaws of the 70 cents on the dollar study do not discredit studies of an entirely different pay gap.)
  • The #ProjectDiane Report, from which this data comes, is available on their website (USD $49.95)
  • More articles on this:
    • “New Report Details Hurdles for Black Women Launching Tech Startups” (2016) by Heather Cabot & Samantha Walravens, on the digitalundivided report
    • “Venture Capital’s Funding Gender Gap is Actually Getting Worse” by Valentina Zarya
    • “The Comprehensive Case for Investing More VC Money in Women-Led Startups” by Wendy DuBow
  • UK’s new law requires companies with more than 250 employees to post average salaries for men and women.

Hidden Figures

  • Hidden Figures film
    • Example clip of Hidden Figures showing both women
    • Movies Stack Exchange answer with a gif of the scene in Mike’s mind
    • Hidden Figures cinematographer/costume designer on this decision
  • Mike’s letterboxd page

Mechanical Keyboards

  • /r/MechanicalKeyboards
  • Cherry MX Red
  • Cherry MX Blue
  • Cherry MX Green
    • Kenneth
  • Cherry MX Brown
    • Dan and Mike
  • Gateron Brown Keys
    • Sam
  • Sam’s keyboard

Stuffed Animals

  • Toothless of How to Train Your Dragon fame
  • Ferris the Crab
  • Obey the Testing Goat! Test-Driven Development with Python by Harry Percival
  • Lapras, the 131st Pokemon
  • Mike and Katarina the Squirrel

Poor Home Improvement Decisions

  • Burrough from HP
  • Canada’s Worst Handyman by Proper Television
  • Canada’s Worst Driver

Walking Simulator video games

  • ABZU by Giant Squid Studios
  • Journey by thatgamecompany
  • A Bird Story by Freebird Games
    • The other game Mike was thinking of was To the Moon

Contact Us!

  • whiletrue.fm

  • @whiletruefm on Twitter

  • Kenneth on Twitter (@kennethlove)

  • Mike on Twitter (@lethargilistic)

  • Dan on Twitter (@danlemmond)

  • Sam on Twitter (@samwho)

  • Programming Discussions on Discord
